name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Mobile Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions, particularly in mobile app development. Expert in **Kotlin Multiplatform**, **CI/CD** using **GitHub Actions**, **Bitrise**, and **Fastlane**, and experienced with **Gradle** for dependency management. Proficient in mobile performance profiling using **Android Studio Profiler**, **Instruments**, and **LeakCanary**, specializing in API design, caching strategies, and data synchronization. Adept in implementing automated testing frameworks to enhance observability and ensure rollout safety while effectively managing performance regressions.
Equipped with a strong background in leading teams, mentoring junior developers, and fostering collaboration and communication to drive team productivity. Skilled in utilizing modern technologies including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Committed to building secure, maintainable, and compliant solutions using principles of microservices architecture and event-driven systems.
